remarks: The factors of ~ ablfac1b cover the entire group.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
statement:
ablfac1.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
ablfac1.o $e |- O = ( od ` G ) $.
ablfac1.s $e |- S = ( p e. A |-> { x e. B | ( O ` x ) || ( p ^ ( p pCnt ( # ` B ) ) ) } ) $.
ablfac1.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) $.
ablfac1.f $e |- ( ph -> B e. Fin ) $.
ablfac1.1 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ Prime ) $.
ablfac1c.d $e |- D = { w e. Prime | w || ( # ` B ) } $.
ablfac1.2 $e |- ( ph -> D C_ A ) $.
ablfac1c $p |- ( ph -> ( G DProd S ) = B ) $.
$d A p x $.
$d B p w x $.
$d D p x $.
$d G p x $.
$d O p x $.
$d p ph w x $.
$d p x $.
